feed.title: Category: Print | Dark Matter in Cyberspace

entry.title: Print First and Last Characters of a Line
entry.content:
Some large files all content are in the same line, there is no newline for the entire file. For them it’s very slow to view them with less or vim. Instead we can use head and tail, for example commands below print first and last 50 characters of a large one-line file:

cat large-one-line.json|head -c 50
cat large-one-line.json|tail -c 50
